title: Announcement, The Mike (Miche Phinck) Fink Guide to Snags and Sawyers in all Typographic Rivers on Most Western Pages, 1993
title_raw: The Mike (Miche Phinck) Fink Guide to Snags and Sawyers in all Typographic Rivers on Most Western Pages
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, recto, across upper right edge, running upward, sideways: Typeface: "Out West on a 15 Degree Ellipse," and design by that flexvous fellow: Edward Fella
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper half of sheet: THE/ MIKE( MICHE PHINCK) FINK/ GUIDE TO SNAGS AND SAWYERS/ IN ALL TYPOGRAPHIC RIVERS/ ON MOST/ WESTERN PAGES; across upper right edge, sideways: the wrong mike fink,/ (d.-1823)/ the fronteir demon/ the dread shot/ the tall tale braggart/ the half horse, half alligator/ the keelboater king; across lower third of sheet: CALIFORNIA INSTITUTE OF THE/ ARTS,/ (805) 255-1050, SCHOOL OF ART/ GRAPHIC/ DESIGN/ PROGRAM/ 24700 MCBEAN PARKWAY/ VALENCIA/ CA 91355/ 'Oh,'
Verso: Imprinted in black across upper two thirds of sheet: "He looked down/ at it slantendicular/ 'So,' says he, 'This is a;;/ brimstone but the concept/ and/ that is aquafortis?'/ 'It's a ripstaver,'/ says I,/ 'if it ain't, I/ wish it may be teotaciously exfluncated!'/ He riz up and put it/ to/ me mighty droll;/ 'Feller,'/ says he,/ 'you have spilled the form.'"; across lower half of sheet to lower edge, center, running downward, sideways: CAL ARTS/ GRAPHIC DESIGN PROGRAM/ SPRING 1993/ LECTURE/ SERIES/ PRESENTS:/ A SLIDE/ LECTURE/ THURSDAY AT 10:30 AM/ ON MARCH 18th/ IN THE BIJOU THEATER/ BY VISITING/ GRAPHIC DESIGNER; across lower edge, center: MIKE FINK
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Mike Fink slide lecture at Califrnia Institute of the Arts.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout. 
Recto: Across upper half of sheet, text giving lecture title frames images of imaginary aquatic creatures, which appear to be underwater. Across upper right edge, text.   Beneath text, image of man wearing hat, holding rifle.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving location, contact information.
Verso: Across upper two-thirds of sheet, text giving fictitious dialogue.  Across lower third of sheet, center, text giving location, time, date.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, The Mike (Miche Phinck) Fink Guide to Snags and Sawyers in all Typographic Rivers on Most Western Pages, 1993. Offset lithograph on tan paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-7
